name: middleman
description: Reverse (transparent) proxy that captures, edits and replays HTTP requests.

scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.build-server: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-client: npm run clean-client && cd ./client && npm run build
scripts.start: if ./scripts/noDir.sh ./build; then npm run build; fi; if ./scripts/noDir.sh ./client/build; then npm run build-client; fi; NODE_ENV=production node ./build/app.js

author: Dave Christenson
